channel.title: 667 Matrix Base Can't Attack Spawned NPCs! (HELP)!
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Hey everyone!
Well all i hear on 667 tutorials is the word "leech"! However, I am not going to publish this I am just using it so i can learn how to code 667s and maybe make my own one day.
Anyway, iv added loads of things like the Armadyl Boss, Zamarok Boss. Iv fixed the trade glitch and the duel arena mess!
But when I tried to move on to the next part, which was adding rock crabs to train on. When I spanwed them I couldn't attack them. It's the same with every NPC I wanted to spawn to attack. I spawned them through NPC Spawning but is it something to do with Combat Definitions?? I dont know im new to 667. Iv tried everything to try and get it to wrk I just can't see the light at the end of the tunnel. :P
Anyway, I really need help with this.
Thanks,
[u]Jack[/u][/size]

item.title: 667 Matrix Base Can't Attack Spawned NPCs! (HELP)!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

z0da:

I think i know exactly what ure doin wrong I was doing wrong 2… Go into the npcspawning file and look at the rock crab spawns… if you did the same misstake as me it should say “false false” somewhere at the end of the line, change it to “true true”

OMFG dude you sexy genious! So simple yet so hard! Ty dude if you want rep you would have to tell me how to do it

Im new here

Now we have a new probelm. They dont respawn??

Read full topic
